channel.title: Projects on Bob Chou
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Bob Chou

item.title: Blog Service WebApp
item.description: Full-stack Web Development : React, Node, Express, MongoDB, Bootstrap, July 2019 – Aug 2019 Developed a web app empowering users to create, update, and comment blogs within the community: Built the back-end with Node, Express, and MongoDB, and supported authentication with Passport Developed the front-end with React and styled the UI with Bootstrap

item.title: From-scratch Scalable and Fault-tolerant Microblogging Server
item.description: Distributed Application, Back-end Development : Golang, gRPC, Raft, Chord, Distributed Hash Table, Mar 2020 – Apr 2020 Designed a Redis-like storage server and built a Twitter-like microblog service (posts/follows/timelines): Designed and built the back-end with a scalable, load-balanced, and fault-tolerant distributed key-value service using a log-structured Chord distributed hashtable and a consenting cluster under Raft protocol Scaled and balanced the front-end traffic with namespace translation and consistent hashing

item.title: Multiplayer Third-person Shooting Video Game
item.description: Game development : Unity3D, .NET, MySQL, ProtoBuf, Oct 2018 – Jan 2019 Developed an online multiplayer video game with authentication, bots, scoreboard, and chatting modules: Supported host/peer multiplayer mode with .NET framework, and applied data persistence in MySQL Designed a packet delivery protocol with ProtoBuf for queuing events among multiple players

item.title: Skeleton-based Human Action Recognition
item.description: Deep learning : Computer Vision, Nov 2018 – Apr 2019 An end-to-end human action recognizer cascaded by OpenPose and deep Graphic ConvNet on skeleton map Designed a attention-GRU to decode temporal feature map, and reached 0.86 accuracy on SBU dataset

item.title: CPvR: VR CardiopulmonaryResuscitation (CPR) Training Platform
item.description: VR development : Virtual Reality, Software Engineering, Oct 2017 – Jul 2018 A VR app for CPR training using Microsoft mixed reality toolkit (\href{https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity}{MRTK}) released Beta on Universal Windows Platform (UWP), supporting Windows MR, compatible with HTC Vive. Designed the core interactive feedback module using finite state machine to analyze real-time pressing data

item.title: Heterogeneous Knowledge Graph Completion
item.description: Algorithm development : Knowledge Representation & Reasoning, Data Mining, Mar 2018 – Apr 2018 An ensemble model for link prediction on a million triples of academic facts and achieved 0.33 mAP@Hit-3 Constructed translating embedding models (TransX) to characterize the triple-represented knowledge Adopted DeepWalk to derive the embedding matrix and sorted entities by L2 distance to predict
